title: Maxime cum principbus philosopho esse diserendum

q: kai\ ta\ qhri/a lo/gwn sunie/nai kinhtikw=n pro\s a)reth/n:'

w(/st' e)linu/onta poiei=n
a)ga/lmata e)p' au)ta=s baqmi/dos e(stao/ta

quote.l: a)nqrw/pwn u(/brin te kai\ eu)nomi/hn u(forw/menon

p.#text:
*swrkano\n e)gkolpi/sasqai kai\ fili/an tima=n
                  
kai\ metie/nai kai\ prosde/xesqai kai\ gewrgei=n, polloi=s
me\n i)di/a| polloi=s de\ kai\ dhmosi/a| xrh/simon kai\ e)/gkarpon genhsome/nhn, filoka/lwn e)sti\ kai\ politikw=n
kai\ filanqrw/pwn ou)x w(s e)/nioi nomi/zousi filodo/cwn:' a)lla\ kai\ tou)nanti/on, filo/doco/s e)sti

kai\ yofodeh\s; o( feu/gwn kai\ fobou/menos a)kou=sai liparh\s tw=n e)n e)cousi/a| kai\ qerapeutiko/s. e)pei\ ti/ fhsin a)nh\r qerapeutiko\s kai\ filosofi/as deo/menos; *si/mwn ou)=n ge/nwmai o( skutoto/mos h)\ *dionu/sios o( grammatisth\s e)k *perikle/ous h)\ *ka/twnos, i(/na moi
 prosdiale/ghtai kai\ proskaqi/zh| w(s *swkra/ths

e)kei/ ciim principibps �i)ris
 nois; kai\ *)ari/stwn me\n o( *xi=os e)pi\ tw=| pa=si diale/gesqai toi=s boulome/nois u(po\ tw=n sofistw=n kakw=s a)kou/wn   ei)=pe   h(mei=s de\ feucou/meqa
 toi=s dunatoi=s kai\ h(gemonikoi=s w(/sper a)gri/ois kai\ a)nhme/rois gi/gnesqai sunh/qeis; ou)k   e)stin o( th=s filosofi/as lo/gos,   kata\ *pi/ndaron a)ll' e)nerga\ bou/letai poiei=n w(=n a)\n a(/yhtai
 kai\ praktika\ kai\ e)/myuxa kai\: kinhtika\s o(rma\s e)nti/qhsi kai\ kri/seis a)gwgou\s e)pi\ ta\ w)fe/lima kai\, proaire/seis filoka/lous kai\ fro/nhma kai\ me/geqos
 meta\ prao/thtos kai\ a)sfalei/as, di' w(=n toi=s u(pere/xousi kai\: dunatoi=s o(milou=sin oi( politikoi\ proqumo/teron.
 kai\ ga/r, a)\n i)atro\s h)=| filo/kalos, h(\dion
o)fqalmo\n i)a/setai to\n u(pe\r pollw=n ble/ponta kai\ pollou\s fula/ssonta kai\ filo/sofos yuxh=s e)pimelh/setai proqumo/teron, h(\n u(pe\r pollw=n fronti/zousan
o(ra=| kai\ polloi=s fronei=n kai\ swfronei=n kai\ dikaiopragei=n
 o)fei/lousan. kai\ ga\r ei) deino\s h)=n peri\ zh/thsin u(da/twn kai\ sunagwgh/n, w(/sper i(storou=si
 to\n *(hrakle/a kai\ pollou\s tw=n pa/lai, ou)k a)\n e)/xaire frewruxw=n e)n e)sxatia=|   th\n subwtikh\n e)kei/nhn *)are/qousan, a)lla\ potamou= tinos

philosopho e)sse disserendpm.
a)ena/ous phga\s a)nakalu/ptwn po/lei te kai\ stratope/dois kai\ futei/ais basile/wn kai\ a)/lsesin. a)kou/omen dh\ *(omh/rou to\n *mi/nw   a)pokalou=ntos: tou=to d' e)sti/n, w(/s fhsin o(  *pla/twn,
 o(milhth\n kai\ maqhth/n: ou)de\ ga\r i)diw/tas ou)d' oi)kourou\s ou)d' a)pra/ktous h)ci/oun ei)=nai qew=n maqhta/s, a)lla\ basilei=s, oi(=s eu)bouli/as e)ggenome/nhs kai\ dikaiosu/nhs

kai\ xrhsto/thtos kai\ megalofrosu/nhs, pa/ntes e)/mellon w)felhqh/sesqai kai\ a)polau/sein oi( xrw/menoi,

to\ h)ru/ggion le/gousi mia=s ai)go\s ei)s to\ sto/ma labou/shs, au)th/n te prw/thn e)kei/nhn kai\ to\ loipo\n ai)po/lion i(/stasqai, me/xri a)\n o( ai)po/los e)ce/lh| proselqw/n:
toiau/thn e)/xousin ai( a)porroiai\ th=s duna/mews o)cu/thta, puro\s di/khn e)pinemome/nhn ta\ geitniw=nta
 kai\ kataskidname/nhn. kai\ mh\n o( tou= filoso/fou lo/gos, e)a\n me\n i)diw/thn e(/na la/bh|, xai/ronta a)pragmosu/nh| kai\ perigra/fonta e(auto\n w(s ke/ntrw| kai\ diasth/mati gewmetrikw=| tai=s peri\ to\ sw=ma xrei/ais, ou) diadi/dwsin ei)s e(te/rous, a)ll' e)n e(ni\ poih/sas e)kei/nw|

galh/nhn kai\ h(suxi/an a)pemara/nqh kai\ sunece/lipen.
a)\n d' a)/rxontos a)ndro\s kai\ politikou= kai\ praktikou= kaqa/yhtai kai\ tou=ton a)naplh/sh| kalokagaqi/as, pollou\s
di' e(no\s w)fe/lhsen, w(s *)anacago/ras *periklei= suggeno/menos kai\ *pla/twn *di/wni kai\ *puqago/ras
 toi=s prwteu/ousin *)italiwtw=n. *ka/twn d' au)to\s
 e)/pleusen a)po\ stratia=s e)p' *)aqhno/dwron kai\ *skipi/wn metepe/myato *panai/tion, o(/t' au)to\n h( su/gklhtos e)ce/pemyen

                  
                   w(/s fhsi *poseidw/nios. ti/ ou)=n e)/dei le/gein to\n *panai/tion;
ei) me\n h)=s h)\ *ba/twn h)\ *poludeu/khs h)/ tis a)/llos i)diw/ths, ta\ me/sa tw=n po/lewn a)podidra/skein boulo/menos, e)n gwni/a| tini\ kaq' h(suxi/an a)nalu/wn sullogismou\s kai\ perie/lkwn filoso/fwn, a)/smenos

a)/n se prosedeca/mhn kai\ sunh=n: e)pei\ d' ui(o\s me\n
*ai)mili/ou *pau/lou tou= disupa/tou ge/gonas, ui(wno\s
de\ *skipi/wnos tou= *)afrikanou= tou= nikh/santos to\n *)anni/ban to\n *karxhdo/nion, ou)k a)/n soi diale/comai;

quote.l: ou) sta/sis ou)de/ te dh=ris a)nai/simos e)n mele/essin

l.#text:
oi( ga\r *ku/prin feu/gontes a)nqrw/pwn a)/gan
 nosou=s1' o(moi/ws toi=s a)/gan qhrwme/nois:

p.#text:
*to\ de\ le/gein o(/ti du/o lo/goi ei)si/n, o( me\n

e)ndia/qetos h(gemo/nos *(ermou= dw=ron o( d' e)n profora=| dia/ktoros kai\ o)rganiko/s, e(/wlo/n e)sti kai\ u(popipte/tw
tw=|
 
                   e)kei=no d' ou)k a)\n e)noxlh/seien, o(/ti kai\ tou= e)ndiaqe/tou
 lo/gou kai\ tou= proforikou= fili/a te/los e)sti/,
tou= me\n
pro\s e(auto\n tou= de\ pro\s e(/teron. o( me\n
 ga\r ei)s a)reth\n dia\ filosofi/as teleutw=n su/mfwnon e(autw=| kai\ a)/mempton u(f' e(autou= kai\ mesto\n ei)rh/nhs kai\ filofrosu/nhs th=s pro\s e(auto\n a)ei\ pare/xetai to\n a)/nqrwpon

                  
ou) pa/qos; lo/gw| duspeiqe\s ou)x o(rmh=s ma/xh pro\s
o(rmh\n ou) logismou= pro\s logismo\n a)nti/basis ou)x
w(/sper e)n meqori/w| tou= e)piqumou=ntos kai\ tou= metanoou=ntos
to\ traxu\ kai\ taraxw=des kai\ to\ h(do/menon,

                   a)ll' eu)menh= pa/nta kai\ fi/la kai\ poiou=nta plei/stwn tugxa/nein a)gaqw=n kai\ e(autw=| xai/rein e(/kaston. tou=
de\ proforikou= th\n *mou=san o( *pi/ndaros   fhsi\n   ei)=nai pro/teron, oi)=mai
de\ mhde\ nu=n, a)ll' a)mousi/a| kai\ a)peirokali/a| to\n
 koino\n *(ermh=n e)mpolai=on kai\ e)/mmisqon gene/sqai.
ou) ga\r h( me\n *)afrodi/th tai=s tou= *propoi/tou qugatra/sin e)mh/nien o(/ti

h( d' *ou)rani/a kai\ *kallio/ph kai\ h( *kleiw\ xai/rousi
 toi=s e)p' a)rguri/w| lumainome/nois to\n lo/gon. a)ll' e)/moige dokei= ta\ tw=n *mousw=n e)/rga kai\ dw=ra ma=llon
h)\ ta\ th=s *)afrodi/ths filoth/sia ei)=nai, kai\ ga\r to\

                   e)/ndocon, o(/ tines tou= lo/gou poiou=ntai te/los, w(s a)rxh\ kai\ spe/rma fili/as h)gaph/qh: ma=llon d' o(/lws
oi(/ ge polloi\ kat' eu)/noian th\n do/can ti/qentai, nomi/zontes h(ma=s mh\ mo/non e)painei=n ou(\s filou=men.
 a)ll' ou(=toi me/n, w(s o( *)ici/wn diw/kwn th\n *(/hran
w)/lisqen ei)s th\n nefe/lhn, ou(/tws a)nti\  th=s fili/as
ei)/dwlon a)pathlo\n kai\ panhguriko\n kai\ perifero/menon u(polamba/nousin. o( de\ nou=n e)/xwn, a)\n e)n politei/ais kai\ pra/cesin a)nastre/fhtai, deh/setai do/chs
 tosau/ths, o(/sh du/namin peri\ ta\s pra/ceis e)k tou= pisteu/esqai
 di/dwsin ou)/te ga\r h(du\ mh\ boulome/nous
ou)/te r(a/|dion w)felei=n, bou/lesqai de\ poiei= to\ pisteu/ein
w(/sper ga\r to\ fw=s ma=llo/n e)stin a)gaqo\n toi=s ble/pousin h)\ toi=s mh\ blepome/nois, ou(/tws; h( do/ca
 toi=s ai)sqanome/nois h)\ toi=s mh\ parorwme/nois. o( d' a)phllagme/nos tou= ta\ koina\ pra/ttein kai\ sunw\n e(autw=|, kai\ ta)gaqo\n e)n h(suxi/a| kai\ a)pragmosu/nh|
tiqe/menos th\n me\n e)n o)/xlois kai\ qea/trois pa/ndhmon
 kai\ a)napeptame/nhn do/can ou(/tws w(s th\n *)afrodi/thn

o( *(ippo/lutos   th=s de\
ge tw=n e)pieikw=n kai\ e)llogi/mwn ou)d' au)to\s katafronei= plou=ton de\ kai\ do/can h(gemonikh\n kai\ du/namin
e)n fili/ais ou) diw/kei, ou) mh\n ou)de\ feu/gei
tau=ta metri/w| proso/nt' h)/qei ou)de\ ga\r tou\s kalou\s
 tw=n ne/wn diw/kei kai\ w(rai/ous, a)lla\ tou\s eu)agw/gous
kai\ kosmi/ous kai\ filomaqei=s: ou)d' oi(=s w(/ra kai\ xa/ris sune/petai kai\ a)/nqos dedi/ttetai to\n filo/sofon ou)d' a)posobei= kai\ a)pelau/nei tw=n a)ci/wn e)pimelei/as to\
 ka/llos. ou(/tws ou)=n a)ci/as h(gemonikh=s kai\ duna/mews a)ndri\ metri/w| kai\ a)stei/w| prosou/shs, ou)k a)fe/cetai
 tou= filei=n kai\ a)gapa=n ou)de\ fobh/setai to\ au)liko\s a)kou=sai kai\ qerapeutiko/s:

kai\ oi( pro\s e)/ndocon ou(/tws kai\ h(gemonikh\n fili/an
e)/xontes. : o( me\n ou)=n a)pra/gmwn filo/sofos ou) feu/cetai tou\s toiou/tous, o( de\ politiko\s kai\ perie/cetai au)tw=n, a)/kousin ou)k e)noxlw=n ou)d' e)pistaqmeu/wn

ta\ w)=ta diale/cesin a)kai/rois kai\ sofistikai=s, boulome/nois
de\ xai/rwn kai\ dialego/menos kai\ sxola/zwn kai\ sunw\n proqu/mws

l: spei/rw d' a)/rouran dw/dex' h(merw=n o(do\n

p.#text:
ou(=tos ei) mh\ mo/non filoge/wrgos a)lla\ kai\ fila/nqrwpos
h)=n, h(\dion a)\n e)/speire th\n tosou/tous tre/fein duname/nhn h)\ to\ *)antisqe/nous e)kei=no xwri/dion,
o(\ mo/lis *au)tolu/kw| palai/ein a)\n h)\rkese: ei) de/ se

h)ro/mhn th\n oi)koume/nhn a(/pasan e)pistre/fein paraitou=mai. kai/toi *)epi/kouros ta)gaqo\n e)n tw=| baquta/tw| th=s h(suxi/as w(/sper e)n a)klu/stw| lime/ni kai\ kwfw=| tiqe/menos tou= eu)= pa/sxein to\ eu)= poiei=n ou)
 mo/non ka/llion a)lla\ kai\ h(/dion ei)=nai/ fhsi. xara=s; ga\r ou)de\n ou(/tw go/nimo/n e)stin w(s xa/ris: a)lla\ sofo\s
h)=n tai=s *xa/risi ta\ o)no/mata qe/menos *)aglai+/hn
 kai\ *eu)frosu/nhn kai\ *qa/leian: to\ ga\r a)gallo/menon kai\ to\ xai=ron e)n tw=| dido/nti th\n xa/rin plei=o/n e)sti
 kai\ kaqarw/teron. dio\ tw=| pa/sxein eu)= ai)sxu/nontai polla/kis, a)ei\ d' a)ga/llontai tw=| eu)= poiei=n: eu)= de\ poiou=si pollou\s oi( poiou=ntes a)gaqou\s w(=n polloi\
de/ontai kai\ tou)nanti/on, oi( a)ei\ diafqei/rontes h(gemo/nas
h)\ basilei=s h)\ tura/nnous dia/boloi kai\ sukofa/ntai

kai\ ko/lakes u(po\ pa/ntwn e)lau/nontai kai\ kola/zontai, kaqa/per ou)k ei)s mi/an ku/lika fa/rmakon
 e)mba/llontes qana/simon, a)ll' ei)s phgh\n dhmosi/a|
r(e/ousan, h(=| xrwme/nous pa/ntas o(rw=sin. w(/sper ou)=n tou\s *kalli/ou kwmw|doume/nous ko/lakas gelw=sin, ou(\s
 
                   
                   kata\ to\n *eu)/polin: tou\s d' *)apollodw/rou tou= tura/nnou kai\ *fala/ridos kai\ *dionusi/ou fi/lous kai\ sunh/qeis a)petumpa/nizon, e)stre/bloun kai\ e)nepi/mprasan, e)nagei=s e)poiou=nto kai\ katara/tous, w(s e)kei/nwn
 me\n a)dikou/ntwn e(/na tou/twn de\ pollou\s: di' e(no\s tou= a)/rxontos: ou(/tws; oi( me\n i)diw/tais suno/ntes au)tou\s: e)kei/nous poiou=sin e(autoi=s a)lu/pous kai\ a)blabei=s kai\ proshnei=s, o( d' a)/rxontos h)=qos
 a)fairw=n moxqhro\n h)\ gnw/mhn e)f' o(\ dei= sugkateuqu/nwn

tro/pon tina\ dhmosi/a| filosofei= kai\ to\ koino\n
e)panorqou=tai, w(=| pa/ntes dioikou=ntai. toi=s i(ereu=sin
ai)dw= kai\ timh\n ai( po/leis ne/mousin, o(/ti ta)gaqa\ para\ tw=n qew=n ou) mo/non au(toi=s   kai\ fi/lois kai\
oi)kei/ois, a)lla\ koinh=| pa=sin ai)tou=ntai toi=s poli/tais
 kai/toi tou\s qeou\s oi( i(erei=s ou) poiou=sin a)gaqw=n
doth=ras, a)lla\ toiou/tous o)/ntas parakalou=si tou\s
d' a)/rxontas oi( suno/ntes tw=n filoso/fwn dikaiote/rous poiou=si kai\ metriwte/rous kai\ proqumote/rous
ei)s to\ eu)= poiei=n, w(/ste kai\ xai/rein ei)ko/s e)sti ma=llon.

e)moi\ de\
dokei= kai\ luropoio\s a)\n h(\dion lu/ran e)rga/sasqai kai\ proqumo/teron, maqw\n w(s o( tau/thn
kthso/menos; th\n lu/ran me/llei to\ *qhbai/wn a)/stu teixi/zein
w(s o( *)amfi/wn, h)\ th\n *lakedaimoni/wn sta/sin pau/ein e)pa/|dwn kai\ paramuqou/menos w(s *qalh=s: kai\
 te/ktwn o(moi/ws phda/lion dhmiourgw=n h(sqh=nai, puqo/menos o(/ti tou=to th\n *qemistokle/ous nauarxi/da kubernh/sei propolemou=san th=s *(ella/dos th\n *pom

phi/ou ta\ peiratika\ katanaumaxou=ntos: ti/ ou)=n oi)/ei peri\ tou= lo/gou to\n filo/sofon dianoou/menon, w(s o(
 tou=ton paralabw\n politiko\s a)nh\r kai\ h(gemoniko\s
koino\n o)/felos e)/stai dikaiodotw=n, nomoqetw=n, kola/zwn
 tou\s ponhrou/s,: au)/cwn tou\s e)pieikei=s kai\ a)gaqou/s; e)moi\ de\ dokei= kai\ nauphgo\s a)stei=os h(/dion
e)rgpa/sasqai phda/lion, puqo/menos o(/ti tou=to th\n *)argw\ kubernh/sei th\n   kai\ tektoniko\s
ou)k a)\n ou(/tw kataskeua/sai a)/rotron proqu/mws;

h)\ a(/macan, w(s tou\s a)/conas, oi(=s e)/melle *so/lwn tou\s no/mous e)gxara/cein. kai\ mh\n oi( lo/goi tw=n filoso/fwn, e)a\n yuxai=s h(gemonikw=n kai\ politikw=n a)ndrw=n e)ggrafw=si bebai/ws kai\ krath/swsi, no/mwn du/namin
lamba/nousin h(=| kai\ *pla/twn ei)s *sikeli/an e)/pleusen,
 e)lpi/zwn ta\ do/gmata no/mous kai\ e)/rga poih/sein e)n
 toi=s *dionusi/ou pra/gmasin a)ll' eu(=re *dionu/sion
w(/sper bibli/on pali/myhston h)\dh molusmw=n a)na/plewn kai\ th\n bafh\n ou)k a)nie/nta th=s turanni/dos,
e)n pollw=| xro/nw| deusopoio\n ou)=san kai\ duse/kpluton:
 a)kmai/ous d) o)/ntas e)/ti dei= tw=n xrhstw=n a)ntilamba/nesqai
lo/gwn.
